change-rep-widget.it-is-highly-advised-to-switch-to-a-diff: It is highly advised to switch to a different representative, in order to improve security and decentralization of the Nano network.
change-rep-widget.rep-represents-you: {{ name }} represents you in the Nano consensus protocol by voting on your behalf.
change-rep-widget.switching-to-a-different-representative-: Switching to a different representative could improve security and decentralization of the Nano network.
change-rep-widget.this-representative-has-a-high-voting-we: This representative has a high voting weight (over {{ percent }}%).
change-rep-widget.this-representative-has-a-very-high-voti: This representative has a very high voting weight (over {{ percent }}%).
change-rep-widget.this-representative-has-announced-plans-: This representative has announced plans to permanently shutdown.
change-rep-widget.this-representative-has-been-offline-for: This representative has been offline for the past {{ days }} days.
change-rep-widget.this-representative-is-marked-as-avoid: This representative is marked as "avoid" in the representatives book.
change-rep-widget.this-representative-is-marked-as-nf: This representative was created by the Nano Foundation and should be avoided to increase decentralization.
change-rep-widget.this-representative-is-often-offline: This representative is often offline ({{ percent }}% uptime)
change-rep-widget.this-representative-is-sometimes-offline: This representative is sometimes offline ({{ percent }}% uptime).
change-rep-widget.we-could-not-determine-status-of-this-re: We could not determine status of this representative.
change-rep-widget.we-found-no-issues-with-uptime-or-weight: We found no issues with uptime or weight distribution of your current representative.
change-rep-widget.you-can-change-representative-at-any-tim: You can change representative at any time by clicking on its name above.
change-rep-widget.you-have-marked-this-representative-as-t: You have marked this representative as trusted, meaning its status will remain "Good" even in case of severe issues with uptime or weight distribution.
